thread.title: Have 'Rangoon' makers trimmed the movie by 40 minutes amidst court battle?
thread.title_full: Have 'Rangoon' makers trimmed the movie by 40 minutes amidst court battle? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Have 'Rangoon' makers trimmed the movie by 40 minutes amidst court battle?
text:
Kangana Ranaut 
While Rangoon's makers battle it out in court with Wadia Movietone over alleged similarities between Kangana Ranaut's character and Fearless Nadia, rumours pouring in suggest that the upcoming film has been trimmed by 40-odd minutes.
The length of the period drama was initially two hours, 47 minutes. But, the makers apparently felt it was a bit much for the current generation of movie-goers and therefore, 'voluntarily' decided to chop off certain portions. Given the ongoing legal wrangle, could there be more than meets the eye?
